actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Fossil and Synthetic Fuels.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fossil and Synthetic Fuels

official_title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Policy Act to eliminate authority under such Act to increase ceiling prices of natural gas higher than the maximum lawful price if just and reasonable.

summary.text: Amends the Natural Gas Policy Act of 1978 to repeal provisions permitting increases in ceiling prices of natural gas higher than the maximum lawful price if just and reasonable.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Policy Act to eliminate authority under such Act to increase ceiling prices of natural gas higher than the maximum lawful price if just and reasonable.
